Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that connects two students and allows them to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate the use of sound in their device to show how information is sent and received.
The student can label the materials used in their drawing to reflect those that help send sound, like string and cups.
The student can include and label features in their drawing, like the distance between the two students, that demonstrate how the device works.
The student can illustrate and label how using the device affects communication over long distances.
